title: Adjust Service for a Special Event
description: A major concert is scheduled. A service planner must add extra late-night train service to accommodate the crowds.

tasks.description: Review the event details, including expected attendance and end time.
Add three extra train departures on the Red Line after the normal end of service.
tasks.expected_outcome: New, temporary trips are added to the schedule.

tasks.description: Assign crews to the extra trips from the extra board (a list of on-call operators).
tasks.expected_outcome: Crews are assigned to operate the extra trains.

tasks.description: Publish the updated schedule and promote the extra service to the public.
tasks.expected_outcome: The public is made aware of the additional late-night service.
